About 28 Telegraph St

Stunning 2 Unit Multi-Fam in South Boston with 6 Beds / 6 Baths just of of Thomas Park. This recently renovated property has lots to offer including spacious living throughout, hardwood floors, beautiful kitchen and baths with quartz countertops, massive waterfall island, 2 tone upper and lower cabinetry, brand new stainless steel appliances with gas cooking. Other amenities include central AC, w/d in-unit, hardwood floors throughout, large private enclosed patio with meticulous landscaping, private composite deck off the top floor and is filled with natural light. This ideal location is steps from some of Southie's best restaurants, shops, and close proximity to beaches, highways and more. Don't miss this gorgeous multi-fam with huge rental potential!
